At Balance Wellness Clinic, My goal is to make you feel like the best version of yourself. I create your individual wellness plan with your own 'road to recovery' map, Balance Wellness Clinic has answers for you from vast variety of Complementary and Alternative Medicine. I ensure that when you say 'yes' to others, you do not say 'no' to yourself. We believe that you must be there for others but you can not leave yourself behind. This is why I offer Reflexology, Homeopathy, Aromatherapy, re-balancing and wellness solutions.
